Pre-Game Insights: Iceland competes within Group 4 of the B league of the Nations League, alongside Montenegro, Turkey, and Wales. The team that wins the group will be promoted to the A-division, while the last-place team will be relegated to the C-division.
Captain Jóhann Berg Guðmundsson has expressed confidence in the team’s preparation despite injuries.
Montenegro's brightest star is captain Stevan Jovetic, who is currently without a club.
Others: The match will kick off at 6:45 PM.
Tickets can be purchased on tix.is.
